text: Splenomegaly is the enlargement of the spleen. It frequently occurs in asscociation with hematological cancers. ==Causes== *Acute myeloid leukemia *Malaria *Chronic lymphocytic leukemia *Autoimmune hemolytic anemia *Polycythemia vera *Chronic myeloid leukemia *Myelofibrosis *Typhoid fever *Infectious mononucleosis *Cirrhosis, often as a result of Portal hypertension. ==References== Category:Diseases and disorders of the cardiovascular system
title: Splenomegaly
